pkgmetadata.longdescription: Oblique Random Forests for Right-Censored Time-to-Event Data // Oblique random survival forests incorporate linear combinations of input variables into random survival forests (Ishwaran, 2008 DOI:10.1214/08-AOAS169). Regularized Cox proportional hazard models (Simon, 2016 DOI:10.18637/jss.v039.i05) are used to identify optimal linear combinations of input variables.
